name: AstroYeet
description:
Race through a dense asteroid field to escape your pursuers with their top secret research data. AstroYeet is similar to an endless runner, but more of a high-speed chase.

You have to evade asteroids while getting shot in a high-speed chase. If you go too slow, your pursuers will close in on you and become more accurate. Go too fast and your ship into asteroids.

Controls (Xbox360 controller / keyboard):

Left Thumbstick / Arrows / WASD : Move left and right

Right Trigger / Spacebar : Speed up

Left Trigger / Left Ctrl : Slow down

This is currently an alpha release very early in development (as of 4/7/19). It's missing many features and improvements that are planned for future releases. It's also using some placeholder assets. Even so, I'm happy have you playing it and giving feedback! It will help prioritize the stuff I work on next.

You can follow active development on GitHub HERE.

AstroYeet will debut its first polished version at Lawrence Tech University Expo on April 20.
